Compute H.h.lambda.1 in the centered DFT

Source: R/H.h.lambda.1.R
H.h.lambda.1.Rd

Compute H.h.lambda.1 in the centered DFT

Usage

H.h.lambda.1(w2, w1, a, taper, A1, A2, inten.fitted)

Arguments

w1, w2

A numeric value or vector of frequency values at horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.

a

Taper coefficient, a value within unit interval. If a = 1, then taper is not applied.

taper

Data taper function.

A1, A2

Side lengths of the observation window.

inten.fitted

Intensity function of individual point pattern.
